title: What’s wrong with Twitter these days? - Quora

response.answer_text: That would depend upon what YOU are thinking is wrong with Twitter right now. Personally I don't find it very much different than it was 6 months ago. Except that there are a lot fewer Bot accounts, as there is a new #TwitterPurge just about every 2 weeks. I loose between 100 to 250 followers every time. Although I gain an average of 50 net followers a day, my page is closing in on 21k followers. I should reach it within a week!
